name: Country Road VR
storyline:
Country Road VR is a virtual petting farm originally designed to help treat individuals with dementia. However, this farm is suitable for all ages. With new immersive and interactive features on the way, it's sure to capture the hearts from every player all over the world. Relased originally on Steam in December 2019, Country Road VR has made recent updates and currently working on more major changes as interest as beginning to grow rapidly.

Country Road VR is a relaxing VR experience and a nice change of pace from the fast moving, zombie shooting games - although many of these games are quite intriguing as well. For the sake of variety, we present to you Country Road VR - self paced, comfortable, and serene. Not a bad place to spend a day! Don't worry, our animals don't bite!
summary:
Country Road VR is a virtual petting farm which allows the user to wander the farm and pet many types of animals including a horse, cows, sheep, goats, and a few funny surprises. The animals respond with movement and their corresponding animal sound as the controllers vibrate.

In addition, you can walk into a sunflower field and atop a hill overlooking the entire farm. Also, there are butterflies all over, some which land in the palm of your hand! Current updates are underway which will make it even more interactive including the ability to feed the animals. This VR experience is currently on Steam for only $2.99 at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1188140/Country_Road_VR/ and available at VR Junkies (VR Arcades) at locations throughout the US. 20% of the net proceeds goes to Alzheimer's research. Country Road VR is suitable for ALL ages.
